name: @libp2p/example-yjs-libp2p
description: A Yjs collaborative editor using libp2p for peer-to-peer connectivity

scripts.test:stun:browser: npm run build && playwright test test/stun-test.spec.js
scripts.test:stun:chrome: npm run build && playwright test test/stun-test.spec.js --project=chromium
scripts.test:stun:firefox: npm run build && playwright test test/stun-test.spec.js --project=firefox
scripts.test:stun:webkit: npm run build && playwright test test/stun-test.spec.js --project=webkit
scripts.test:stun: npm run test:stun:node && npm run test:stun:browser
scripts.test:ice:firefox: npm run build && playwright test test/firefox-ice-test.spec.js --project=firefox
scripts.test:firefox:diagnostic: npm run build && playwright test test/firefox-webrtc-diagnostic.spec.js --project=firefox
scripts.test:firefox:manual-webrtc: npm run build && playwright test test/manual-webrtc-test.spec.js --project=firefox
scripts.test:debug:webkit: npm run build && playwright test test/debug-webkit.spec.js --project=webkit
